#Importing Data - Train and Test
training <- read.csv("pml-training.csv",stringsAsFactors = TRUE,header=T)
testing <- read.csv("pml-testing.csv",stringsAsFactors = TRUE,header=T)

#Replacing all empty values as NA
training[training == ""] <- NA

#Computing sum of NA value in all columns
Col_NA <- colSums(is.na(training))
table(Col_NA)

#Only keeping those columns where no NA are present (because proportion of NA is very high in all the other columns with NA,So missing value imputation may not yield good result)  
training <- training[,Col_NA==0]
testing <- testing[,Col_NA==0]

#Remove first 7 columns as they are not involved in readings
training <- training[,-c(1:7)]
testing <- testing[,-c(1:7)]

#Creating a validation set for assesing different models
library(caret)
inTrain  <- createDataPartition(training$classe, p=0.7, list=FALSE)
Train <- training[inTrain, ]
Test  <- training[-inTrain, ]
